Welcome to Project’s documentation!¶

Project (/Barak Basson/) is a Python project for uploading thoughts of users. It’s based on Dan Gittik’s course Advanced system design and offers a simple and intuitve API.

Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to install the project.

Note

This project is under active development.
